What is carpooling?

Carpooling is a device that aims to reduce fuel costs while protecting our planet. That is to say that it is a way of driving differently by sharing one's car with people making the same journey.

  • usage

    • Carpooling is a modern hitchhiking device that connects potential road mates. This system is therefore suitable for drivers and passengers who regularly make the same journey or more punctual.

  • Vous êtes passager ?

    • You want to travel cheaper, faster. A simple and economical solution that will allow you to expand your social network and make money and time, all in a secure and friendly atmosphere. Use the "Pip Yallah" carpool application in Morocco and book a seat now!

  • Are you a driver?

    • You have a vehicle and want to offer your free seats. Offer a carpooling solution in Morocco to share the cost of your trip, reduce Co2 emissions and congestion, and expand your circle of friends.


Pip Yallah Application, 2018.

Actualizar Cambia el idioma Cerrar sesión Notificaciones enviar verificación Regístrate Si encuentra que nuestra aplicación es útil para usted, puede compartir esta aplicación gratuita desde aquí con sus amigos. Luego compartir! el idioma se modificó con éxito
